properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 10 at 4:01PM PST until February 10 at 4:45PM PST by NWS Phoenix AZ
properties.description:
At 355 PM PST, Imperial County Public Works reported minor flooding
with water over Dunaway Road which is closed from Interstate 8 to
Evan Hewes Road southeast of Plaster City. Overflowing poor drainage
areas will result in additional minor flooding. Up to one inch of
rain has already fallen.

Some locations that will experience flooding include...
El Centro, Calexico, Imperial, Plaster City, Ocotillo, Mt. Signal, El
Centro Naval Airfield, Heber, Coyote Wells, Dixieland and Seeley.
properties.instruction:
Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small
creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as
well as other drainage areas and low lying spots.

In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are
potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded
roads. Find an alternate route.

A Flood Advisory means river or stream flows are elevated, or ponding
of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.

NWSheadline: THE FLOOD ADVISORY FOR MINOR FLOODING IN POOR DRAINAGE AREAS REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM PST FOR SOUTHWESTERN IMPERIAL COUNTY
